articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Slashes at Another UN "Sanctions Resolution"
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Slashes at Another UN "Sanctions Resolution"
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued a statement on Sunday as regards the fact that the hostile forces are getting hell-bent on the sinister moves for sanctions and pressure on the DPRK.
					 The statement says:
					
					 Hostile forces are now in a flurry, being disconcerted over the gunfire of victory set off by the DPRK's self-defensive industry in numbers and in succession. Pressing this panic button, they are desperate in their vicious attempts to put sanctions and pressure to bear upon against the DPRK.
					
					 On June 3, the United Nations Security Council again framed up "sanctions resolution" taking an issue of the DPRK's launch of ballistic rocket which is aimed to bolster up its nuclear forces.
					
					 This "resolution", which is said to have been drafted after a long "consultation" between the U.S. and China, places entities and individuals related with the DPRK's nuclear and rocket program as a target of "additional sanctions".
					
					 Earlier, the U.S. took its own way of announcing "unilateral sanctions" against the DPRK and included in it "secondary boycott" with a target of businesses and individuals of even Russia and other third countries which are alleged to have links with the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK Ministry of Foreign Affairs gives a strong condemnation and rejection to the UNSC's another campaign of sanctions as it is a crafty hostile act with the purpose of putting a curb on the DPRK's buildup of nuclear forces, disarming it and causing economic suffocation to it.
					
					 The U.S. steps up its military buildup including the modernization of nuclear weapons just in order to obtain the exclusive and permanent possession of the most sophisticated weapon system in the world. But, other country can't be allowed to test or launch any object which goes with the words of nuclear or "ballistic". This is really the height of shameless arrogance, self-righteousness and double standards.
					
					 Two countries railroaded "sanctions resolution" at the UNSC after having drafted it in the backroom at their own pleasure and are enforcing it upon others just paving it as "the general will of the international society". It is a bare expression of high-handed and arbitrary act in pursuit of their own interests trampling upon the international justice.
					
					 The buildup of nuclear forces by the DPRK is all too natural an exercise of its sovereignty to thwart what the U.S. imposed nuclear threat against the DPRK in an unprecedented way. It is also to achieve genuine international justice let alone the fact that it is to ensure peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the region.
					
					 It is a fatal miscalculation if the countries, which have had a hand in the frame-up of the "sanctions resolution", would even think that they can delay or hold in check the eye-opening development of the DPRK's nuclear forces even for a moment.
					
					 They would squarely see that their mean and indiscreet act would go in just opposite direction to what they want for.
					
					 They kept saying about "dialogue" this time. But, it does not make any sense to profess about dialogue with unjust preconditions attached and by applying "maximum pressure".
					
					 No matter what others say, whatever sanctions and pressure may follow, we will not flinch from the road to build up nuclear forces which was chosen to defend the sovereignty of the country and the rights to national existence and will move forward towards the final victory.
					
					 The "Juche Rocket", ultra precision and diversified, will continue to thunder and skyrocket in full blast in numbers and in succession until the moment when the U.S. and its followers are brought to reason about the root cause and a solution to the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula and take their right choices.

articles.title: Pyongyang Exchange Group of Disabled Persons Back Home
articles.content:
Pyongyang Exchange Group of Disabled Persons Back Home
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang exchange group of disabled persons led by Kim Mun Chol, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled, came back home Sunday after giving performances in the UK.

articles.title: Participants in 8th KCU Congress Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in 8th KCU Congress Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 8th Congress of the Korean Children's Union visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home, they recalled the revolutionary careers and feats of the President.
					
					 They climbed Mangyong Hill and went round relics including the study and Ssirum sites where the President cultivated the strong will and high ambition for the revolution in his childhood.
					
					 The participants also visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt Taesong.
					
					 They laid bounces of flowers at the bust of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk and paid tribute to her before looking round the cemetery.
					
					 At the Youth Movement Museum, they laid bouquets before the full-length statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il among youths and children and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 And they looked round photos of the great leaders and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, historic materials and relics on display.
					
					 Besides, they toured the basic science hall and children's dream hall and a "national exhibition of children's science fictions and models-2017" at the Sci-Tech Complex.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 80th Anniversary of Pochonbo Battle
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 80th Anniversary of Pochonbo Battle
 Hyesan, June 4 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Ryanggang Provincial Art Theatre Saturday to mark the 80th anniversary of the historic victorious Pochonbo battle commanded by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present at the meeting were Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Ri Myong Su and other senior party, state and army officials, officials of party and armed forces organs, ministries, national institutions and field of education, merited persons, men and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, party information workers, of the commanding officers and members of the 216 Shock Brigade and officials and working people in Ryanggang Province.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, member of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, made a report.
					
					 The brilliant victory in the Pochonbo battle commanded by Kim Il Sung was a historic event of weighty significance in the Korean people's anti-Japanese armed struggle and the world people's struggle for national liberation, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 The Pochonbo battle, conducted in the critical time when the destiny of the Korean nation was at the crossroads of life and death due to the monstrous colonial rule by the Japanese imperialists, gave the Koreans hope for revival and aroused them to the sacred war for national liberation.
					
					 As the Korean people cherished the firm faith and will to follow President Kim Il sung and the unshakable conviction in the victory of the revolution, they could accomplish the historic cause of national liberation by defeating the ferocious Japanese imperialist aggressors through an indomitable struggle and demonstrate the before the world their dignity as a heroic people who crushed the U.S. imperialists boasting of being the "strongest" in the world.
					
					 Our people had worked heroic epic of creation and construction in different annals of the revolution and laid eternal foundations for building a prosperous and powerful country. This is a miracle of history brought by the indomitable revolutionary faith to staunchly go the long way of the revolution under the leadership of the President.
					
					 The flames of Pochonbo, which has brightly showed the road ahead of the Korean revolution for eight decades, is raging furiously as a banner of struggle hastening its final victory under the wise guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is successfully accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt Paektu.
					
					 The gun report of revolution in Pochonbo is that for the anti-imperialist revolution and Songun as it taught the philosophical principle that it is needed to fight against the outrageous imperialist aggressors with arms to the last.
					
					 The reporter called upon all the people to glorify the revolutionary traditions of Paektu as the eternal ideological asset of Korea and dynamically advance to accomplish the cause of building a socialist power of Juche.

articles.title: Party Information Workers Start Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites
articles.content:
Party Information Workers Start Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites
 Hyesan, June 4 (KCNA) -- Party information workers started their study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu.
					 A kick-off ceremony took place in front of the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Hyesan City of Ryanggang Province Sunday.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets at the statues and paid homage to the great leaders.
					
					 Making a report at the ceremony, Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, said:
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, who kindled the hot wind of education in the revolutionary traditions across the country, made sure that the party information workers directly responsible for the party ideological work could visit the area of Mt Paektu on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the historic victorious Pochonbo battle.
					
					 The expedition will be an important occasion in learning more about Mt Paektu which represents the spirit and stamina of Songun Korea and inspiring the army and people to the drive for devotedly defending the leader and  implementing the party's idea by conducting the party ideological work exactly the way the anti-Japanese guerrillas did.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, they looked round the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo and the Ryanggang Provincial Revolutionary Museum.

articles.title: Young People Hold Torchlight Procession and Campfire Meeting
articles.content:
Young People Hold Torchlight Procession and Campfire Meeting
 Pochon, June 4 (KCNA) -- Students and other young people had a torchlight procession and campfire meeting in Pochonbo on Sunday to mark the 80th anniversary of the victorious battle of Pochonbo commanded by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Among those present there were Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and premier of the Cabinet; Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK; Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Ri Myong Su, chief of the General Staff of the KPA; and Choe Pu Il, minister of People's Security.
					
					 With song "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" being played, the participants left for Pochonbo with torches in their hands.
					
					 The playing of song "The Guerrilla March" greatly encouraged them passing through major battle sites such as the police sub-station and the subcounty office.
					
					 Senior officials of the party, state and army, officials of the party and power organs and youth league and marchers lit a fire.
					
					 A part on the battle of Pochonbo of a long epic "Mt Paektu" was recited.
					
					 After the meeting, the participants danced around the campfire to the tune of revolutionary songs.

articles.title: Samjiyon Band Gives Performance to Mark Anniversary of Victorious Pochonbo Battle
articles.content:
Samjiyon Band Gives Performance to Mark Anniversary of Victorious Pochonbo Battle
 Hyesan, June 4 (KCNA) -- The Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe gave a performance at the Ryanggang Provincial Art Theater on Sunday, the 80th anniversary of the victorious Pochonbo battle organized by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Enjoying the performance were Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, and other senior party, state and army officials, officials of party and armed forces organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and party information workers taking part in the study tour of battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The numbers of the performance, which started with prelude "Song of the Revolutionary Army", included female vocal sextet "Pochonbo, Land of Glory", instrumental music and song "Yanji Bomb" and male quintet "Mother Is Always with Red Flag".
					
					 The performers sang loudly of the feats of President Kim Il Sung, ever-victorious brilliant commander, outstanding strategist and peerlessly great man who led the anti-Japanese war to a shining victory and achieved the country's liberation.

articles.title: National Children's Football Games Close
articles.content:
National Children's Football Games Close
 Wonsan, June 4 (KCNA) -- The 4th national children's football games closed.
					 There were football finals in the playground of the Songdowon International Children's Camp on Sunday.
					
					 The first place in the games was taken by boys' team of Pyongyang and girls' team of Nampho.
					
					 The finals were followed by a closing ceremony
					
					 Present there were Pak Jong Nam, chairman of the Kangwon Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the youth league and campers.

articles.title: Pochonbo Torchlight Will Be Immortal: Papers
articles.content:
Pochonbo Torchlight Will Be Immortal: Papers
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- DPRK's leading newspapers Sunday dedicate editorials to the 80th anniversary of the victorious Pochonbo battle commanded by President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Pochonbo battle was a historic event that turned the nation's history to liberation from statelessness and ushered in a turning phase in the anti-Japanese armed struggle, says Rodong Sinmun.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The battle recorded the most shining page in the history of the anti-Japanese revolutionary war and greatly encouraged the oppressed people of the world in their national liberation struggle.
					
					 The battle helped all Koreans and progressive mankind deeply enshrine the image of the President as the legendary hero of the nation and peerlessly patriot. It also dealt a serious political and military blow at the colonial ruling system of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 That's why the Pochonbo torchlight has since served as the indomitable symbol of the Korean revolution and the dynamic driving force of the nation-wide struggle for national independence and independent development.
					
					 The Pochonbo torchlight will be everlasting along with the ever-victorious history of heroic Korea thanks to the immortal revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the tested guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and the inexhaustible national power.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the flame of Pochonbo kindled by the President will continue to flare up as the one of eternal victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Make Proper Choice
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Make Proper Choice
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday stresses in an article that the successful test-fire of ground-to-ground medium-to-long range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-12 clearly showed that the DPRK is capable of striking the mainland of the U.S. most rapidly and accurately at will from any place any time.
					 The article says:
					
					 If the U.S. dares provoke the DPRK, disregarding the reality, it will be reduced to ashes by the latter's just nuclear strike.
					
					 Although the U.S. is threatening and blackmailing the DPRK with lots of nuclear strategic equipment deployed around the Korean peninsula, while crying out for what they call pressure, the DPRK views it as an American-style bluff and a ridiculous action of cowards who dare not attack but beat the air in a distant place.
					
					 The policy of strength which the U.S. regards as almighty may work on other countries but never on the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is left with no other way but to make a final option: it should roll back the hostile policy towards the DPRK or it can not help being under the powerful and merciless nuclear attack by the DPRK.
					
					 If the Trump administration persists in its reckless moves, disregarding the warning of the DPRK, with no measure for handling the aftermath of their actions in hand, the nuclear attack capability of the DPRK will be boosted up more rapidly day by day.
					
					 It is the clear stand of the DPRK that it will produce more precision and diversified nuclear weapons and striking means until the U.S. makes a proper choice. The more production would mean the earlier ruin of the U.S.

articles.title: Independence Is Fundamental Stand to Be Preserved in Solving Issue of Inter-Korean Relations: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Independence Is Fundamental Stand to Be Preserved in Solving Issue of Inter-Korean Relations: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The improvement of the north-south relations is an important prerequisite to ensuring peace on the Korean peninsula and achieving the independent reunification of the Korean nation, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The north-south relations are now at the crucial crossroads -- whether to enter the orbit of improvement or to repeat the evil cycle of confrontation.
					
					 If we remain an onlooker to the present north-south relations which are under a catastrophic phase, no politician can claim to have fulfilled his or her responsibility and role before the nation nor can win support by the people.
					
					 To turn a deaf ear to disgrace and misfortune suffered by the nation and misspend time, being obsessed with factional interests and distrust in compatriots, will be tantamount to mocking the nation's desire for the reunification, a crime to be cursed by the generations to come.
					
					 The north-south relations should be healed at an early date and the road to national reconciliation and unity, peace and reunification be opened.
					
					 What is most important in overhauling the relations is to adhere to the independent stand, prioritize the nation and rely on the nation's efforts.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should make a decision of breaking with the anachronistic and treacherous policy of dependence on outside forces and opt for solving the issue of the north-south relations independently by the Korean nation itself.
					
					 It is the consistent stand and unwavering will of the DPRK to reject outsiders and settle the issue of the inter-Korean relations and the country's reunification independently by pooling efforts of Koreans on the principle of national independence and unity.
					
					 If the north and the south hold hands from the independent stand, anti-reunification moves of outside forces will be ineffective and a new turning phase will be definitely opened in the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Group Flailed for Putting Brake in Wheel for Improved North-South Relations
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Group Flailed for Putting Brake in Wheel for Improved North-South Relations
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The conservative group of south Korea is now spewing out rubbish against the DPRK.
					 The coteries of the "Liberal Korea Party" and the "Parun Party" vied with each other in claiming that the "north commits indiscriminate missile provocations as the pro-north leftist regime took office in south Korea" and "this was prompted by the north's confidence" that the U.S. would not attack the nuclear facilities of the north without consent of south Korea. They went to the length of blasting that "there would be no dialogue unless the north drops nuclear and missile programs" and "consistent sanctions and pressure should be imposed on the north".
					
					 Meanwhile, conservative media spread opinions for confrontation that it is illusion to improve the south-north relations through dialogue," "the south may be used for strengthening the nuclear arming of the north" and "a resolute message should be sent to the north".
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary on Sunday terms this a heinous anti-national racket for throwing cold water on the great expectation and ardent desire of the whole nation to improve the north-south relations and reunify the country and escalating confrontation with the north.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Now that the strategic position of the DPRK is rising remarkably, many countries including neighboring countries are expressing their intention to come out for large-scale economic cooperation with the DPRK.
					
					 Positive movements for improving the north-south relations are brisk in south Korea amid the loud voices that the way for tiding over the security crisis, difficult economy and deteriorated people's living caused by the conservative group for nine years of its office is nothing but dialogue, negotiation, exchange and cooperation with the north.
					
					 This eloquently proves how foolish and absurd the sycophancy toward the U.S. and cooperation with it persistently pursued by the conservative group are.
					
					 It is an irrepressible trend of the times to improve inter-Korean relations and the conservative group should be awakened from the foolish dream.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Confrontational Farce of S. Korean Conservatives
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Confrontational Farce of S. Korean Conservatives
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The conservatives of south Korea undertook a reckless "coloring theory" offensive against the candidates at a confirmation hearing of the "National Assembly" under the pretext of "verifying their outlook on security", thus turning the meeting into a theatre for confrontation with the DPRK.
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun Sunday comments that it is a confrontational farce performed by only the group of traitors with the inveterate hostility towards the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 It says:
					
					 The venue was so reminiscent of the confirmation hearing in the period of Park Geun Hye regime. In those days one had to slander the fellow countrymen in the north and cry out for confrontation with them in order to draw attention of the conservatives and hold the post of minister.
					
					 But such racket is no longer workable. 
					
					 Those who are siding with the confrontation racket of the living corpse-like conservatives while studying their face, would be well advised to be mindful that it is an insult to the candlelight demonstrators and also a suicidal act to be at the beck and call of the conservatives, being frightened by their campaign to eliminate the "followers of the north."
					
					 No matter how desperately the puppet conservatives may act, it will only accelerate their doom.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Belarus
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Off Press in Belarus
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Uphold Independence" was brought out in Belarus on May 30.
					The work, published on September 7, Juche 70 (1981), clarifies that it is the requirement of the present era to maintain independence in party and state activities and the Juche idea is a man-centered philosophy.

articles.title: Might of DPRK Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Might of DPRK Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Internet websites of Russia and Brazil posted articles praising the DPRK on May 17 and 22.
					 Russia's Irkutskblogspot. ru in its article stressed that respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un is the peerlessly great man as he has brought astonishing events one after another with his superb leadership, bold decision and strong mettle and pluck.
					
					 It said:
					
					 The U.S. ceaseless sanctions gave full play to the DPRK's spirit of self-development. This spirit is now tightening the windpipe of the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK has become the arch rival to the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK is the only country which can bring the U.S. to submission or ruin.
					
					 Disclosing the countless U.S. hostile acts against the DPRK, Brazilia's Marcia Verde said:
					
					 The "sanctions resolutions", cooked up at the UN by the U.S., assume the criminal nature as they are evidently an encroachment upon sovereignty.
					
					 The DPRK's possession of nukes is a self-defensive step against the hostile moves committed by the successive administrations of the U.S. in conspiracy with its vassal forces.
					
					 The U.S., which has brought only misfortune and sufferings to the weak countries and nations, now encounters the strong rival which has capability to sink its nuclear aircraft carriers.

articles.title: Romanian Political Party Urges S. Korean Authorities' Political Decision
articles.content:
Romanian Political Party Urges S. Korean Authorities' Political Decision
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The National Socialist Party of Romania posted an article on May 30 to mark the 17th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Noting that after the joint declaration, a landmark for Korea's reunification, was adopted on June 15, 2000, big progress had been made in the reunification movement, the article said:
					
					 The eye-opening achievements in the era of June 15 reunification were faced with grave challenge since the pro-U.S. conservative forces, crazy for north-south confrontation, came to power in south Korea.
					
					 The relations between the north and the south got worse day by day and the tour of Mt Kumgang was stopped and the Kaesong Industrial Zone shut down.
					
					 The present south Korean authorities should make a political decision of urgently improving the north-south relations for the country's reunification, the greatest desire of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Vocero de cancilleria coreana denuncia la sancion inventada por EE.UU. y CS de ONU
articles.content:
Vocero de cancilleria coreana denuncia la sancion inventada por EE.UU. y CS de ONU
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que las fuerzas hostiles, tan pasmadas ante el reciente lanzamiento de cohete balistico de la RPDC, se recurren desesperadamente a las maniobras de sancion y presion contra la RPDC, el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica hoy una declaracion que senala:
					El dia 3, el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU volvio a inventar la llamada "resolucion de sancion" que cuestiona el lanzamiento de cohete balistico de la RPDC encaminado al fortalecimiento de sus fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					Esta "resolucion", que Estados Unidos "consulto" durante largo tiempo con China, definio como objeto de "sancion adicional" a las entidades e individuos relacionados con el plan de armas nucleares y cohetes de la RPDC. Con anterioridad a esto, el pais americano dio a la publicidad una "sancion independiente" contra la RPDC incluyendo la "segunda sancion" contra las empresas e individuos de Rusia y otros paises relacionados con la RPDC.
					
					Condenamos rotundamente y rechazamos totalmente las tentativas de "sancion" que volvieron a escenificar el pais norteamericano y el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU calificandolas del perverso acto hostil encaminado a obstaculizar el fortalecimiento de fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC, desarmarla completamente y asfixiarla en lo economico. 
					
					Devienen la extrema expresion de la arrogancia, egoismo y doble rasero las insistencias en que ellos mismos pueden hacer el aumento armamentista como la modernizacion de armas nucleares para monopolizar para siempre los sistemas de armas mas perfectos en el mundo y que otro pais no puede realizar todos los ensayos y lanzamientos expresados con las palabras "nucleares" y "balisticas".  
					
					EE.UU. y China fabricaron a su capricho el "proyecto de la resolucion de sanciones" en una trastienda y lo adoptaron coercitivamente en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU describiendolo como la "unanime opinion de la sociedad internacional", lo cual es la expresion flagrante de la coaccion y arbitrariedad que persiguen solamente sus intereses pisoteando la justicia internacional. 
					
					Seria una gran equivocacion si los paises inventores de la presente "resolucion" piensan en que podrian dilatar o obstaculizar en lo minimo el desarrollo deslumbrante de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC.
					
					Esta vez, ellos refirieron al "dialogo". Pero, resulta absurdo hablar de los "dialogos" presentando las injustas condiciones premisas y dando la "presion maxima". 
					
					Se lanzaran de manera mutifacetica y sucesiva los "cohetes Juche" precisos y diversificados al maximo hasta cuando EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras tomen una opcion justa enterandose de la causa raigal del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y los remedios para su solucion.

articles.title: Acto central por aniversario 80 de la victoria de Batalla de Pochonbo
articles.content:
Acto central por aniversario 80 de la victoria de Batalla de Pochonbo
Hyesan, 4 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en el Teatro de Arte de la provincia de Ryanggang el acto central por el aniversario 80 de la victoria en la historica Batalla de Pochonbo, organizada y dirigida por el Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion Pak Pong Ju, Kim Ki Nam, Ri Myong Su y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, fuerzas armadas, ministerios, organos centrales y el sector de educacion, los ameritados, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de propaganda del partido, los funcionarios y brigadistas de la Division 16 de Febrero y los funcionarios y trabajadores de la provincia citada. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y vicepresidente del CC del PTC.
					
					La fulminante victoria en la Batalla de Pochonbo, organizada y dirigida por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, fue un evento historico para la lucha armada antijaponesa del pueblo coreano y la de emancipacion nacional de los pueblos del mundo, comenzo el orador y prosiguio:                             
					
					La batalla, librada cuando el destino nacional se hallaba en la encrucijada de vida o muerte debido al brutal coloniaje japones, marco un hito importante para infundir a la nacion coreana la esperanza de renacimiento y llamar a todos los compatriotas a la sagrada lucha por la liberacion de la patria.
					
					Gracias a la firme conviccion de seguir hasta el final al Presidente y la inconmovible confianza en la victoria de la revolucion, el pueblo coreano pudo cumplir la historica causa de liberacion al derrotar al bandidesco imperialismo japones mediante la lucha constante y demostrar a todo el mundo su dignidad de pueblo heroico que vencio al imperialismo norteamericano que se jactaba de la "supremacia" mundial. 
					
					En cada decada de la revolucion, el pueblo coreano ha consolidado el firme cimiento de construccion de una patria prospera escribiendo la epopeya de creacion y construccion, lo que es un milagro de la historia engendrado por la indoblegable conviccion revolucionaria de avanzar invariablemente por el largo camino de la revolucion bajo la orientacion del Presidente. 
					
					Las llamas de Pochonbo, que vienen iluminando durante 80 anos el camino a seguir por la revolucion coreana, sirven de bandera en la actual lucha por adelantar la victoria final bajo la sabia guia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un quien va cumpliendo la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el monte Paektu.
					
					Las detonaciones resonadas hace 80 anos en Pochonbo son las de la revolucion antiimperialista y del Songun que ensenaron la verdad de que hay que hacer frente hasta el final con fusiles a los barbaros agresores imperialistas. 
					
					Todos deben glorificar las tradiciones revolucionarias del Paektu como eterno patrimonio ideo-espiritual de Corea y luchar con firmeza por llevar a feliz termino la causa de construccion de potencia socialista del tipo Juche.
